title: Zaza Pachulia - Wikipedia
snippet: He played for seven teams in his 16-year NBA career, winning two championships with the Warriors in 2017 and 2018. He also played for the Georgia national team, captaining them in multiple tournaments. Pachulia also had a reputation of being a "dirty" player, notably injuring Kawhi Leonard ...

title: Zaza Pachulia, Basketball Player, Stats, Height, Age | Proballers
snippet: On April 25, 2015, Zaza Pachulia set his career high in steals in a NBA Playoffs game. That day he reached 6 steals in Milwaukee's home win against Chicago, 92-90.

title: Zaza Pachulia - Atlanta Hawks Center | StatMuse
snippet: Zaza Pachulia played 16 seasons for 6 teams, including the Hawks and Bucks. He averaged 6.8 points and 5.8 rebounds in 1,098 regular-season games. He won 2 NBA championships.
